AddPurchaseOrder.name: AddPurchaseOrder
AddPurchaseOrder.description: Grants permission to add a new purchase order

DeletePurchaseOrder.name: DeletePurchaseOrder
DeletePurchaseOrder.description: Grants permission to delete a purchase order

GetConsoleActionSetEnforced.name: GetConsoleActionSetEnforced
GetConsoleActionSetEnforced.description: Grants permission to view whether existing or fine-grained IAM actions are being used to control authorization to Billing, Cost Management, and Account consoles

GetPurchaseOrder.name: GetPurchaseOrder
GetPurchaseOrder.description: Grants permission to get a purchase order

ListPurchaseOrderInvoices.name: ListPurchaseOrderInvoices
ListPurchaseOrderInvoices.description: Grants permission to list purchase order invoices

ListPurchaseOrders.name: ListPurchaseOrders
ListPurchaseOrders.description: Grants permission to list all purchase orders for an account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a purchase order

ModifyPurchaseOrders.name: ModifyPurchaseOrders
ModifyPurchaseOrders.description: Grants permission to modify purchase orders and details

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag purchase orders with given key value pairs

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a purchase order

UpdateConsoleActionSetEnforced.name: UpdateConsoleActionSetEnforced
UpdateConsoleActionSetEnforced.description: Grants permission to change whether existing or fine-grained IAM actions will be used to control authorization to Billing, Cost Management, and Account consoles

UpdatePurchaseOrder.name: UpdatePurchaseOrder
UpdatePurchaseOrder.description: Grants permission to update an existing purchase order

UpdatePurchaseOrderStatus.name: UpdatePurchaseOrderStatus
UpdatePurchaseOrderStatus.description: Grants permission to set purchase order status

ViewPurchaseOrders.name: ViewPurchaseOrders
ViewPurchaseOrders.description: Grants permission to view purchase orders and details
